sentences.en: Fig . 8 . 29 shows the effect on the solution of including elasticity and enhanced viscosity.
sentences.cn: 图8.29表示考虑弹性变形及粘度提高对计算结果的影响.

sentences.en: For the normal paraffinic hydrocarbons, a number of dilute - gas viscosity have been developed.
sentences.cn: 对于正构烷烃, 已发展了许多稀薄气体粘度的特定关系.

sentences.en: Glass and pitch behave like supercooled liquids of very high viscosity.
sentences.cn: 玻璃和沥青的行为很像具有极高粘滞性的过冷液体.

sentences.en: Good dispersion of clean, low - temperature start, viscosity - temperature oxidation stability and performance.
sentences.cn: 优良的清净分散性 、 低温启动性 、 粘温性能及氧化安定性.

sentences.en: I firmly plant product viscosity, the brightly - colored, complete specifications, color and diverse.
sentences.cn: 我厂产品粘度牢固 、 色泽鲜艳, 规格齐全, 颜色多样.

sentences.en: The predetermined solution viscosity of the thickened solution should preferably be above 600 centipoises.
sentences.cn: 增稠溶液的规定粘度最好在600厘泊以上.

sentences.en: The reciprocal of viscosity is known as fluidity.
sentences.cn: 粘度的反意就是流动性.

sentences.en: The unit of kinematic viscosity is the stoke.
The viscosity of the polymer was 2.16 poise.
The viscosity shows a rather pronounced variation with temperature.
sentences.cn: 温度对粘度的影响十分明显.

sentences.en: Then the curve charts of the melting - points and viscosity are drawn.
sentences.cn: 绘出了熔点曲线图及粘度曲线田.

sentences.en: Viscosity overwhelms the smallest eddies and converts their energy into heat.
sentences.cn: 粘性制服了最小的旋涡而将其能量转换为热.

sentences.en: Volatiles should not be added to the epoxies to improve their viscosity.
sentences.cn: 不应将挥发物加到环氧树脂中去改善它们的粘性.

sentences.en: We supply viscosity controller, favourable price. Welcome to order and contact us.
sentences.cn: 宇科粘度控制器,价格优惠, 欢迎来电 、 来函、来人垂询、订购.

sentences.en: When turbulence breaks out, a fluid behaves as though its viscosity has suddenly increased.
sentences.cn: 湍流爆发时, 流体显得其粘性突然增加了.

trans.tran_en: Viscosity is the quality that some liquids have of being thick and sticky
